title: OFAC Sanctions Russian National Accused of Using Virtual Currency to Launder Money
description: According to the United States Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC), Russian national Ekaterina Zhdanova has been sanctioned as punishment for using virtual currency to launder money for designated Russian elites. OFAC said Zhdanova’s properties and interests in the United States are now either blocked or must be reported. Russian Elites Seeking to Evade U.S. […]

title: Bitcoin Miners face 52.5% reward cut: Insights from the Barefoot Mining CEO
description: The Bitcoin mining community stands on the precipice of a defining moment. With less than 25,000 blocks remaining before the widely-anticipated halving event, the countdown has the industry abuzz. Once the significant milestone is achieved, the rewards earned by Bitcoin miners per block, setting aside transaction fees, are slated to take a sharp nosedive. From ... Read more

title: FLOKI Sees $54.4 Million Locked In Its Staking Platform
description:
Analyst and trader Crypto Tony revealed that the Total Value Locked (TVL) for Floki (FLOKI) achieved a major milestone. According to the X post, the meme coin’s TVL has hit $54.4 million over the past 24 hours. Along with the TVL milestone, the number of FLOKI holders has also surpassed 460,000. Meanwhile, FLOKI’s marketing has […]

The post FLOKI Sees $54.4 Million Locked In Its Staking Platform appeared first on Coin Edition.
